name: Barasandya: The Lost Relic
description:
Barasandya: The Lost Relic

Barasandya is an art exhibition using 2d game media created by Avontual DKV UPI. This exhibition allows players to see 120 works and also enjoy the game at the same time

Team Leader
Andre Budi Raharjo
